CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT( ISPICKVAL(Liability_Certification__c,""))&& ISPICKVAL(Liability_Certification__c,"Yes")&& NOT( ISPICKVAL(Debarment_Certification__c,"")) && ISPICKVAL(Debarment_Certification__c,"Yes")&& NOT( ISPICKVAL(CSLB_Certification__c,"")) && ISPICKVAL(CSLB_Certification__c,"Yes")&& NOT( ISPICKVAL(Ready_to_Submit__c,"")) && ISPICKVAL(Ready_to_Submit__c,"Yes"),true,false)
||
IF(HonestContractor__c = true,true,false)
CustomField.label: testtest
